content.taskInstructions:
Instructions


Attempt to login to Citrix endpoints and determine if MFA is enabled.

masterFinding.remediationInstructions: Ensure Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) is implemented on all management interfaces exposed to the internet. Alternatively, consider placing them behind a firewall to ensure only LAN and VPN user are able to access them.
masterFinding.name: Remote Management Interface - Citrix - MFA Not Enabled
masterFinding.businessImpact: A remote unauthenticated attacker may be able to conduct successful password guessing attacks if  Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) has not been implemented.
masterFinding.description: A Citrix remote desktop or application publishing server was found available which may provide access to a private Local Area Network (LAN) from a remote location. The affected servers don't appear to require Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA).
